org.littleshoot.proxy.test

Class SocketClientUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.littleshoot.proxy.test.SocketClientUtil

  • public class SocketClientUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Utilities for interacting with the proxy server using sockets.

      SocketClientUtil()

      static java.net.Socket getSocketToProxyServer(HttpProxyServer proxyServer)
      Opens a socket to the specified proxy server with a 3s timeout.
      static boolean isSocketReadyToRead(java.net.Socket socket)
      Determines if the socket can be read from.
      static boolean isSocketReadyToWrite(java.net.Socket socket)
      Determines if the socket can be written to.
      static java.lang.String readStringFromSocket(java.net.Socket socket)
      Reads all available data from the socket and returns a String containing that content, interpreted in the UTF-8 charset.
      static void writeStringToSocket(java.lang.String string, java.net.Socket socket)
      Writes and flushes the UTF-8 encoded contents of a String to a socket.

        Writes and flushes the UTF-8 encoded contents of a String to a socket.

        socket - socket to write to

        java.io.IOException

      • readStringFromSocket

        public static java.lang.String readStringFromSocket(java.net.Socket socket)
                                             throws java.io.IOException
        Reads all available data from the socket and returns a String containing that content, interpreted in the UTF-8 charset.
        Parameters:
        socket - socket to read UTF-8 bytes from
        Returns:
        String containing the contents of whatever was read from the socket
        Throws:
        java.io.EOFException - if the socket has been closed
        java.io.IOException

      • isSocketReadyToWrite

        public static boolean isSocketReadyToWrite(java.net.Socket socket)
                                    throws java.io.IOException
        Determines if the socket can be written to. This method tests the writability of the socket by writing to the socket, so it should only be used immediately before closing the socket.
        Parameters:
        socket - socket to test
        Returns:
        true if the socket is open and can be written to, otherwise false
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • isSocketReadyToRead

        public static boolean isSocketReadyToRead(java.net.Socket socket)
                                   throws java.io.IOException
        Determines if the socket can be read from. This method tests the readability of the socket by attempting to read a byte from the socket. If successful, the byte will be lost, so this method should only be called immediately before closing the socket.
        Parameters:
        socket - socket to test
        Returns:
        true if the socket is open and can be read from, otherwise false
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • getSocketToProxyServer

        public static java.net.Socket getSocketToProxyServer(HttpProxyServer proxyServer)
                                              throws java.io.IOException
        Opens a socket to the specified proxy server with a 3s timeout. The socket should be closed after it has been used.
        Parameters:
        proxyServer - proxy server to open the socket to
        Returns:
        the new socket
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
